pages.body:
# List of Zites: Services | [[zite-list-services-talk|Talk]]

### Sites that provide some sort of utility to the visitor can be classified as a 'Service' site

**[Nullpaste](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/).**  
Nullpaste is a version of Pastebin for [[ZeroNet]]. The zite offers both public and private publishing, syntax highlighting, and the ability to view recent pastes.  
  * Zite Address:   1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz  
  * Zite Discussion: [0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY/NullPaste+Decentralized+pastebin+with+code+highlighting+encryption), ZeroCentral  
  * Zite Domain: 0pastebin.bit (unconfirmed)  

**[ZeroID](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/).**  
ZeroID is used as an authentication service for username ID's Obtaining a alias from this service will allow visitors to post comments on the various zites available on Zeronet.
  * Zite Address:   1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral  
  * Zite Domain: zeroid.bit  

**[ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/).**  
ZeroMail is ZeroNet's version of a mail client. ZeroMail allows visitors with a registered ZeroID username to send encrypted messages to other users who have a ZeroID username. The ZeroMail system can not be used to send email to external email addresses.  
  * Zite Address:  	1MaiL5gfBM1cyb4a8e3iiL8L5gXmoAJu27  
  * Zite Discussion: 0List, ZeroCentral, [ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:10_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL/ZeroMail+support+thread)  
  * Zite Domain: Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit  

**[ZeroPolls](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroPolls.bit/).**  
ZeroPolls is a polling platform that allows visitors with an assigned ZeroID to post and vote on polls. Results can be viewed after a vote is submitted and comments can be posted by clicking on the poll's title. **Be advised that there is a small chance that an attacker could discover your votes associated with your ZeroID with a bit of effort.**  
  * Zite Address:   1K28kQFMquNzto2iQf4GGjr6oFUbC1NddE  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_1Mk5sVKeCrwMc3wSD11jM7DZTiqF5D9BaD/ZeroPolls), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:4_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf/ZeroPolls), ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: ZeroPolls.bit  

**[ZeroProxies](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo/).**  
ZeroProxies is a site that contains a list of Zeronet proxy sites. These proxy sites allows visitors of the regular internet to be able to view a ZeroNet zite without installing or running the Zeronet client engine. Due to the portal being provided by a proxy, functionality can be limited.  
  * Zite Address:   14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, 
ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1ArMJqDaBJqeJ4MX3VqSnkfwkHe23PtLrW/Running+a+ZeroProxy)  
  * Zite Domain: 0proxy.bit, 0proxies.bit, zeroproxy.bit, zeroproxies.bit  

**[ZeroQuotes](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1NJyPoPpL8At17T6G7A1qHVQdqZDBmXcLT).**  
ZeroQuotes is a platform that features Quotes submitted by visitors. The site allows visitors to vote on the quotes that they enjoy.  
  * Zite Address:   1NJyPoPpL8At17T6G7A1qHVQdqZDBmXcLT  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:81_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroQuotes), 
[ZeroCentral](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/?Topic:81_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroQuotes), ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[ZeroTODOs](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1B8LmXYHzMGZzcRWoidAQb5SmKSyfjN63f).**  
ZeroTODO's is a platform that allows visitors to create tasks and checklists and organize activity in a planner style.  
  * Zite Address:   1B8LmXYHzMGZzcRWoidAQb5SmKSyfjN63f  
  * Zite Discussion: 
[0List](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:100_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/ZeroTodos), 
ZeroCentral, ZeroTalk  
  * Zite Domain: n/a  

**[ZeroVerse](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ).**  
ZeroVerse is an alternative platform to ZeroID, While operating in a similar way, the service will eventually be accepted in multiple places that accept ZeroID usernames.  
  * Zite Address:   1HPgDoReCFtE9qy71hnp55ksBVvV1gHJLQ  
  * Zite Discussion: 
0List, ZeroCentral, 
[ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:4_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf/yourID+ZeroVerse+bit+make+yourself+another+ZeroID)  
  * Zite Domain: zeroverse.bit  

**[QR Generator](http://127.0.0.1:43110/qrgen.bit/).**  
QR Generator creates QR codes instantly.   
  * Zite Address:   1NQhJp2DNAXwLUE6eFLVx7jnmBMEy3NJbo 
  * Zite Discussion: 
  * Zite Domain: qrgen.bit
